name: Donut Get Burned!!
description:
Burgers and buns and kabobs, oh my! A simple little donut like you can't take this heat! And what's this? Ew, did someone spill relish all over the place?? Better hurry up and get back to others before you get burned!

made by Sean and IAN for the Make 10 short games! VARIETY MEGAJAM 2020 with PuzzleScript.

(4/10)
